long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,es_419,:
â˜…â˜…â˜… Listed:  Editor's Picks â˜…â˜…â˜…

It's an app that will change startup page chrome into the best start page with gorgeous live wallpapers.

Live Start Page is:

âœ” Beautiful "live" wallpapers that will surely decorate your custom start page (over 500 themes);
âœ” Weather
âœ” List of sites for quick access to them;
âœ” To-do lists;
âœ” Stylish new tab clock;

Live wallpaper for your start page? Yes, you heard right! Real live wallpapers right on the screen of your Chrome startup page. Imagine travelingâ€”deep into a tropical forest or a seaside setting. You can enjoy a nice, calm rest in the middle of your workday right on your Chrome startup page with tab wallpapers. Perhaps you would prefer to gaze in awe at stunning views of the most distant and unexplored corners of the planetâ€”without leaving your computer, simply having the best start page! 

For those who are even bolder, you can recharge with the energy of burning flames by choosing the fire theme on the Google start page. Give yourself a break from mundane, everyday work. Let your eyes relax and your brain recharge with positive emotions. The new Live Start Page app can make this all very real for you with your best start page, just click on the button and the Google Chrome start page will open and reveal all features!
Unlike live wallpapers, which eat up work resources, Live Start Page with tab wallpapers does not slow down your computer or your browser. Just install this add-on on your browser and check out the best start page yourself. It will take you only a few minutes to download and install, but the positive emotions from working with a custom start page will last for a long time!

ğŸ’¡ Instructions on how to work with a custom start page:

ğŸ‘‰ Start with adding a start page. Adopt a flat design with tab wallpapers and a new tab clock that is very popular among users. The default icons for custom new tabs are: Weather, Settings, Live tab wallpapers, List of sites for quick access to them; To-do lists; New tab clock;

ğŸ‘‰ After opening a custom new tab, click the [Add] button in the upper right corner to quickly view and add icons for new tab clock, popular websites, such as Google to create a Google start page, Amazon, eBay, etc., or search here, for example, when you want to add Instagram, you only need to enter Instagram, related products will appear - Pinterest, Reddit, VK, 500px, WhatsApp, etc.

ğŸ‘‰ When you can't find the website you want in the system, you can choose to add it. Such as a daily relaxed moment, Huihui shopping assistant, gif tool. Just enter the URL and name, Google Chrome start page can automatically generate a solid color icon, or upload the image directly from the local as an icon and then add it to the custom new tab.

ğŸ‘‰ The page is added directly. What do you do when you want to save them to the Chrome startup page while you are brushing Sina Weibo and headlines, but don't want to leave the current page? At this time, you only need to click the tab wallpapers extension button next to the address bar, and the small window that adds the website to the custom new tab will pop up automatically.

Make the best Chrome start page with a live wallpapers collection! 

Change startup page Chrome with different moving wallpapers on custom new tabs. Try video as wallpaper, and you will have dynamic wallpaper on your custom start page. These moving wallpapers also work for Windows 10 and Mac. 

ğŸš© The collection consists of theme wallpapers that create a winter holidays atmosphere with Christmas live wallpaper or New Year wallpaper (happy New Year wallpaper, New Year 2024 wallpaper, New Year wallpaper 2024). Feel the holiday coming and wish a happy new year with wallpaper 2024 or create a Christmas theme background. Celebrate Halloween with Halloween live wallpaper or zombie live wallpaper. 

ğŸš© All new wallpapers have HD format and are in good quality, for example, New Year wallpaper HD. In addition to live wallpaper HD, you can also find new 3D wallpapers or 4D wallpaper 2020 in the collection for your custom start page. 3D parallax wallpapers created as moving live wallpapers represent live themes and make your personal backgrounds even cooler. 

ğŸš© Make a special atmosphere not only with New Year wallpaper 2023. Times Square wallpapers will help you feel the air of the Big Apple. Are you a fan of the New York sports team? Try New York Giants wallpaper.

ğŸš© Your background theme on your start page or new tab clock can tell a lot about you. Choose the best car wallpapers or moving anime wallpapers and show your preferences. Or maybe you like video games. Then try cool PS4 backgrounds, cyberpunk live wallpaper, or Xbox backgrounds. PS4 background wallpaper is the cool moving background for you. 

ğŸš© Cool moving background collection is what you've always looked for for your start page. Our collection of free live wallpapers is the top selection of moving wallpapers for PC and live wallpapers for laptops, especially Chrome wallpapers for your Chrome startup page. Google Chrome wallpaper is your perfect slide background and cool moving wallpapers with live background, for example, low battery wallpaper. Make your page look like a presentation slide background with one piece live wallpaper. Cool live wallpapers can also be in a form of a clock wallpaper for a new tab clock or live photo background on your start page. 

ğŸš© Custom background and wallpaper lively are what we offer when we say new best wallpapers. Choose your best live wallpapers. Use new cute wallpaper such as love live wallpaper. Try live photo wallpaper or interactive wallpaper. Play with colours and pick red theme wallpaper or purple theme wallpaper. 

 ğŸš© A beautiful live wallpaper collection also consists of nature live wallpapers for your Chrome startup page. Find them all: live water wallpaper, free fire new wallpaper, rain live wallpaper, black moon wallpaper, under the sea background, and, of course, space live wallpaper. 

This extension takes over your new tab and the search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing.  (You can disable search in the settings).

Disclaimer:
*Live Start Page extension offers premium functionality by means of a  subscription. If you subscribe, you will be billed monthly or annually. You can use it for free. You can disable the new tab page opening in the Live Start Page extension settings

*Live Start Page extension is not part of Google but is rather an independent product.

Please read our Privacy Policy - https://everhelper.pro/privacy.php

User Data Policy:
Live Start Page extension may use History to create Bookmark tiles (Speed Dial) for you. The extension sends requests to the server to synchronize your bookmark tiles (speed dials), tasks, and other settings. You can disable Synchronization and Speed Dial in the Live Start Page extension settings. You can turn off New Tab Page and access it only through the Live Start Page button through  the browser panel

Live Start Page extension may use your Location service to show your Weather Forecast right inside the Live Start Page extension. We recognize that location-sharing is a concern for many people, and it is a responsibility we take very seriously. You can disable the Weather widget in the extension settings.

This extension has built-in monetization (ads) to support Live Start Page extension development features and needs to use user data: search bar provided by Microsoft Bing, sponsored bookmark tiles (for example Amazon bookmark), and Premium Accounts. You can disable all of this in the settings or during onboarding.

Contact us:
https://livestartpage.com/contact

New tab page and speed dials in Live Start Page extension: hundreds of unique live backgrounds in your browser. Incredible meditation features, tasks, and weather forecasts.

Live Start Page is a browser extension that will significantly enhance your work experience on the computer. Replace your boring start page with an incredible new tab page dashboard featuring live wallpapers, meditation mode, to-dos, and other features.

This extension takes over your new tab and changes your search bar inside the Live Start Page to Bing. You can disable it in settings if needed.

Tired and worn out? Feeling nervous, with your productivity hitting zero? Open a new page and the Live Start Page extension will turn on meditation mode: 10-15 minutes of viewing the best live wallpapers to the sounds of nature will get you back into great shape. Want to get more out of your meditations? 

A special meditative series from professional psychologists to help you better understand yourself and improve your mood and sleep. You'll see results with just a few weeks of regular meditations! They available in the new tab, you need to click the meditation button.

â˜… Meditation modeâ€”with nature and ambient sounds

â˜… To-do list
â˜… Several types of clocks
â˜… Focus mode to set goals when you open new tab page

- Speed dials linksâ€”for single-click access to your most frequently viewed links and websites. Better than bookmarks!

There is something important that we need to mention. Weâ€™ve built a live screen that includes all of these neat features. We offer a multitude of themes to choose between and use in your browser. Letâ€™s take a moment to realize that the concern is not only to achieve a nice look.  Itâ€™s also very good for your nervous system. How so? The answer is really quite simple.

Perhaps you would prefer to gaze in awe at stunning views of the most distant and unexplored corners of the planetâ€”without leaving your computer! For those who are even bolder, you can recharge with the energy of burning flames by choosing the fire theme. Give yourself a break from mundane everyday work. Let your eyes relax and your brain recharge with positive emotions. The new Live Start Page app can make this all very real for you, just click on the button and the new tab page will open and reveal all features!

*Live Start Page extension offers premium functionality by means of a  subscription. If you subscribe, you will be billed monthly or annually. You can use it for free. You can disable the new tab page opening in the Live Start Page extension settings

*Live Start Page extension is not part of Google but is rather an independent product.

Please read our Privacy Policy - https://everhelper.pro/privacy.php

long.it:
Una estensione semplice e accessibile con tutto il necessario per lavorare in modo piacevole:

FunzionalitÃ :
- Lista delle cose da fare
- Orologi (diversi tipi)
- Centinaia di sfondi live


- Ora attuale per essere sicuro di non perderti negli abissi della realtÃ  virtuale;
- Informazioni meteo in tempo reale per evitare di dimenticarti dello straordinario mondo reale lÃ  fuori;
- Un organizzatore che ti permetterÃ  di risparmiare tempo prezioso e che si ricorderÃ  per te anche dei piÃ¹ piccoli dettagli;
- Composizioni rapide per un accesso rapido con un solo clic ai collegamenti e ai siti web piÃ¹ frequentati.

Oh sÃ¬, c'Ã¨ ancora una cosa che ci siamo dimenticati di citare: una schermata live che accoglie tutte queste interessanti funzionalitÃ . Offriamo una moltitudine di temi tra cui scegliere che puoi utilizzare nel tuo browser. In realtÃ , non Ã¨ solo una questione di estetica, Ã¨ ottimo per il tuo sistema nervoso. Come mai? Ãˆ semplice.

Tutti noi, dagli abitanti delle cittÃ  ai grandi appassionati delle praterie d'ufficio, viviamo in una crisi di tempo costante. Siamo risucchiati nella ruota del progresso tecnologico e ci dimentichiamo facilmente quanto puÃ² essere bello un cielo d'estate solcato dall'agile volo di passeri e rondini... e di quanto possano mozzare il fiato i raggi di sole che lottano contro i rami degli alberi per raggiungere la nostra pelle. Viviamo e facciamo le cose in modo meccanico, concentrandoci unicamente sulle nostre attivitÃ  e sui nostri problemi. Ma quando riusciamo a fermare la ruota anche solo per qualche minuto, la vita ci appare tanto piÃ¹ bella.

Viaggiando nella mente nel fitto di una foresta tropicale o lungo il mare puoi riposarti e rilassarti anche nel bel mezzo di una giornata di lavoro. Goditi una vista mozzafiato degli angoli piÃ¹ remoti e inesplorati del pianeta senza lasciare il computer! O forse preferiresti ricaricare le energie vedendo bruciare le fiamme con il nostro tema di fuoco? Permettiti di fare una pausa dal tuo banale lavoro quotidiano, lasciando che gli occhi si rilassino e che il cervello venga alimentato da emozioni positive. La nuova Live Start Page rende tutto ciÃ² estremamente reale!

Leggi le condizioni d'uso e le informative sulla privacy
https://everhelper.pro/privacy.php

Per contattarci: https://livestartpage.com/contact
